TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeviceElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Maps specific adapters to specific mobile controls for a given device. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class represents a `device` element in an XML configuration file.

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the device adapter set.
The device adapter set that this device adapter set inherits from.
